means: 集中( center的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The discussion centered around four subjects.
His whole mind , his whole being, was centered in revolution.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的整个身心都放在革命上.

sentence.Network_en: All his attention has centered on that experiment.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的全部注意力都集中在那个实验上.

PerfectNetExp.abs: They are just as self - centered as the good - looking ones ., 他们和长得漂亮的男人一样都是以自我为中心.
centerboard 活动船板centered 居中的centering 置于中心
The sketch should be centered horizontally on the canvas ., 示意图应为本横向画布上的.
constructing a guarantee regulatory system centered with re - guarantee ., 构建以再担保为核心的担保监管体系.

means.word_mean: 1. being or placed in the center
2. concentrated on or clustered around a central point or purpose

Sentence.sentence: His ideas forced a reexamination of the early leadership paradigm (范例), which he observed centered on traits found in the character ethic and the personality ethic.
